title: Playboy Repents And Is Reborn Into A Complicated Relationship With Five People
alternative_title: Haiwang Congliang Hou Xianrule Wu Deng Fen Xiuluo Chang ; Hǎiwáng Cóngliáng Hòu Xiànrùle Wǔ Děng Fēn Xiūluō Chǎng ; Playboy Repents and Is Reborn Into a Complicated Relationship With Five People ; Si Playboy yang Bereinkarnasi Terjebak dengan Lima Haremnya ; The Playboy Has Reformed After Falling Into Five Equal Love Complex ; 海王从良后陷入了五等分修罗场
status: Haiwang Congliang Hou Xianrule Wu Deng Fen Xiuluo Chang ; Hǎiwáng Cóngliáng Hòu Xiànrùle Wǔ Děng Fēn Xiūluō Chǎng ; Playboy Repents and Is Reborn Into a Complicated Relationship With Five People ; Si Playboy yang Bereinkarnasi Terjebak dengan Lima Haremnya ; The Playboy Has Reformed After Falling Into Five Equal Love Complex ; 海王从良后陷入了五等分修罗场
description:
Description :
        The playboy is reborn at a crucial moment in '1 Day with 4 Suitors.' To survive, he sends them all breakup letters and runs away. Unexpectedly, his exes all rush to seduce him, and the guy he sought shelter with seems to have increasingly intense eyes each day! I've fallen into a complicated situationship with too many people. How do I deal with having too many husbands?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 4: You Are My Most Loyal Puppy
Chapter 1: Reborn At A Crucial Moment In '1 Day With 4 Suitors'
